Package imageeditor

Class EditorStateModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
imageeditor.EditorStateModel
public class EditorStateModel
extends java.util.Observable
This class models the state of the whole editor application. It implements the observer pattern (extends the Observable class) so that views can be notified of changes in the model properties.
Author:
Lorenzo Bianchi

  • Method Details

    • canUndo

      public boolean canUndo()
      Returns true if there is some action to undo, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true when there are actions to undo

    • canRedo

      public boolean canRedo()
      Returns true if there is some action to redo, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      true when there are actions to redo

    • resetUndoRedoStack

      public void resetUndoRedoStack()
      Clears the undo stack and restarts from the current state.

    • undo

      public void undo()
      Undoes the last edit action if possible, otherwise does nothing

    • redo

      public void redo()
      Redoes the last undid edit action if possible, otherwise does nothing.

    • getActiveTool

      public ToolType getActiveTool()
      Gets the currently active painting tool
      Returns:
      the id of the tool

      public void setActiveTool​(ToolType activeTool)
      Sets the currently active painting tool
      Parameters:
      activeTool - the id of a tool

    • getActiveCharacter

      public char getActiveCharacter()
      Gets the character that will be used for painting operations

      Sets the character that will be used for painting operations

      Parameters:

    • getMainPanelModel

      public AsciiPanelModel getMainPanelModel()
      Gets the model of the main panel
      Returns:
      an AsciiPanelModel instance

    • beginPaint

      public AsciiPainter beginPaint()
      Obtains a painter that paints to the current raster. The painter is initialized with active foreground and background colors.
      Returns:
      an initialized instance of AsciiPainter

    • beginUndoablePaint

      public AsciiPainter beginUndoablePaint()
      Inserts a new entry into the undo stack, then obtains a painter that paints to the current raster. The painter is initialized with active foreground and background colors.
      Returns:
      an initialized instance of AsciiPainter

    • endPaint

      public void endPaint​(AsciiPainter painter)
      Notifies main panel model of changes made with the specified painter
      Parameters:
      painter - a painter obtained by calling beginPaint()
